title: The Anointing of Ease | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Anointing of Ease | Joel Osteen
description:
We all go through difficult seasons, but we have to remember those difficulties aren’t permanent. When you step into God’s anointing of ease, what was once difficult is going to suddenly become easy. You're about to walk into His supernatural grace and favor.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
